Package fi.abo.kogni.soile2.http_server

package fi.abo.kogni.soile2.http_server
The main server classes for SOILE. Also contains the setup classes that allow setting up a basic SOILE server with a few examples as well as the Route building functionality that uses the API to set up all backend routes.
Author:
Thomas Pfau
